long_description: With a capacity of 3.2 liters, the REI Campware cook pot is large enough for making big meals yet it is sized to stow easily in your backpack on the hike in. Teflon(R) Classic coating provides excellent nonstick performance, making the post-meal cleanup a breeze. Lid includes strainer holes to make draining water simple; silicon thumb pads on the lid help you strain hot liquids without burning your hands. Stainless-steel wire handles snap up and down and are coated in heat-resistant silicon. Black exterior of the pot absorbs heat from your stove. Spiral pattern on the bottom of the REI Campware cook pot grips your stove or grill top. Includes a storage sack.
short_description: With a capacity of 3.2 liters, the REI Campware cook pot is large enough for making big meals yet it is sized to stow easily in your backpack on the hike in.
